name: Night Road Radio
description:
You are a salesman Driving home late from Chicago, listening to Night Road Radio… Until some Strange things starts to happen.

Realistic Car Control : 
You have start with gear on the n°1 position. You'll need to up and down your gears to drive ! If you make a mistake with them, you'll need to restart the engine. The gears Under the first allows you to drive backward. 

Goal : 
There is an ending to the game, will you be able to find it ? ;) 

(Yes, we know the the first radio clip is really quiet, thank you!)
